Text: Shasta Lake NotificationSean We have agreed to send Shasta Lake daily email notification with strike price information when we exercise the transmission option Here is Jerry Cupps email address Please cc me on the notices Thanks Jim Jim Buerkle Manager Middle Market Enron North America SW Salmon St WTC Portland OR Office Mobile Fax

Re black hillswouldnt spend a bunch of time on them Originally the guy calls me up and saysyou know we are looking to put in a gas turbine cogen and would like to know if Enron is interested in working with usthe thing isthe oilfield cant really pay anything for the steamare you interested Answer NO To Jim CT cc Subject Re black hills I left him a couple of messages but never heard back I will try to follow up again today Jim Buerkle AM To Kim CT cc Subject Re black hills Yea thanks for the heads up Kimbo Black Hills wanted to get on EOL to look at pricing but apparently they cant get read only access like we can they need to put up credit Anyway they got access through Enserco Did that Texaco lead we talked about ever get anywhere Let me know Jim From Kim Ward AM To Jim CT cc Subject black hills Jim Are you and or Steve Thome working with Black hills Should we work with EOL to get them online instead of rejected Kim Forwarded by Kim WardHOUECT on AM Ami NRON AM To Fred CT Edward D CT Kim CT Sylvia S CT Maureen CT Jane M CT Janet H CT Daniel CT Harry CT Lisa CT Bryan CT Bill nron Teresa nron Douglas S CT Larry nron Adam CT Kevin NRON Jennifer CT Caroline nron Matthew GoeringHOUECT Tom CT Mark nron Craig CT Nelson NRON Charles H CT Troy NRON George N CT Alan CT Don CT John L CT Bill nron Adriane nron Jennifer deBoisblanc CT Kara L BoudreauHOUECT Sheetal CT cc Claudia CT Bob CT Lisa CT Sheri CT Karen O nron Subject This report lists all customers that are going to receive a rejection letter from credit regarding their EnronOnline application If you want this process delayed so you can contact your customer or follow up with credit on behalf of your customer please contact Claudia Clark at x or Karen ODay at x If they are not contacted the rejection letter will be sent directly to the customer PA Company Name Bernstein Investment Research Managemant Black Hills Energy Capital Inc BBC Trading NV Thank You Ami Thakkar EnronOnline
